sect2.title: System.GetDefaultDeviceName
sect2.para: This operator gets the default device name for the current session of Dataphor. All objects (tables, domains, etc) are created in the default device unless another device is specified in the create statement. Because the device is specified by name, it does not have to exist when SetDefaultDeviceName is called. If the device does not exist when the default device is accessed, by a create or other operation, D4 raises an exception. Optionally the libarary (ALibraryName) name can be specified.
